mapper.sql: ad.id, ad.analysis_id AS "analysisDepot.id", ad.dict_id AS "dictType.id", ad.analysis_name AS "name", ad.analysis_desc AS "desc", ad.create_by AS "createBy.id", ad.create_date, ad.update_by AS "updateBy.id", ad.update_date
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO analysis_depot( id, analysis_id, dict_id, analysis_name, analysis_desc, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{analysisDepot.id}, #{dictType.id}, #{name}, #{desc}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}
)
mapper.update: UPDATE analysis_depot SET analysis_id = #{analysisDepot.id}, dict_id = #{dictType.id}, analysis_name = #{name}, analysis_desc = #{desc}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, WHERE id = #{id}
